about_the_game:
Strategic Deckbuilding
Create a unique deck that suits your playstyle and strategy. There's no randomness in the building of your deck. Your strategy and choices determine your path to victory.

RPG Elements
Define your character's identity by unlocking skills, attributes, and specializations (100+). Play as a cunning rogue, an armored knight, a powerful sorcerer, or anything in between. The choice is yours.

Friendly Shopkeepers
A selection of fully-voiced shopkeepers to comment on your choices and progress (1500+ lines in total).

Dynamic Equipment System
Spend your hard-earned gold on new gear from a selection of over 70 items, but remember - equipment degrades over time, so choose wisely and manage your resources carefully.

Challenging Opponents
Face off against 30 unique opponents that will force you to change your strategy.

High Stakes Combat
With a small health pool, every fight matters. Pay close attention to each round, as a single mistake could be your downfall.

Customizable Difficulty
Whether you're a deckbuilding novice or a seasoned veteran, Archons: Arena has you covered. Adjust the difficulty to keep the game challenging, fun, and accessible.

In-Game Editor
Edit and extend the game to your liking, and test your changes within the same session.
